sirisena-rajapaksha hawula illa sitina paridi, parlimenthuwe walangu bhawaya ese kal ikuth wimata maththen iwarayak kara gatha haki ekama wyawasthanukula margaya wanne, ‘‘parlimenthuwa wisin ehi nopamini mantha්riwarayan da athuluwa mulu mantha්riwarayange sankhyawen thunen dekakata noadu sankhyawakage yojana sammathayak magin parlimenthuwa wisuruwa harina lesa janadhipathiwarayagen illimak karanu labanne nam’’ ho ‘‘parlimenthuwe pa්rathama rauswima sandaha niyama kara ganu labu dinayen awurudu hatharak saha masa hayaka kalayak awasan wimen pasuwa ho..’’

ranga ayiyage lipiyaaadaraniya ranga ayiya wethatayiane ayiye mata oya ewapu liyume thibuna dewal adahagannawath ba.mage hitha hath kadakata tikak aduwen pali giyada manda.mata therenawa ayiyage hithe thiyena wedanawa.ayiya mata kamathi wune mage iskoleta thiyena thana nisawath thaman yalu wela inne "wishaka eke" kellek ekka kiyala yaluwo ekka kiyawannawath neweyi kiyala mama dannawa mage iskole nama nisa.wishaka kiyanne budu sasune agra dayikawa.ee namata thiyena aadaraya,gaurawaya nisa neda ayiya mata kamathi wune...ehema nathuwa mage muna lassana nisawath mage anga hada nisawath neweyi neda...ehew ayiyage hitha ara pagamana nisa ridena eka sadharanayi kiyala mata dan therenawa.anika mama dannawa.ayiyalage iskole big mach ehema thiyenakota ayiyala ewwata giye aariya sinhala anduma andagena.oyala arakku biyar ehema athinwath allala na.big mach walata yana ayiyala kochchara sanwarawa hasirenawada...
